column4: does it matter if i use the i386 installer instead of amd64 on a athlon 64 cpu?
does it matter if i use the i386 installer instead of amd64 on a athlon 64 cpu?
32bit stuff will run on 64bit processors.  You're perfectly fine installing a 32bit system
i'm using the 32bit one right now, and windows dectects the cd, but when i tried to boot using the cd, i get an error saying there's no bootable software
